price: Hakika Sisi tumembainishia Njia. Ama ni mwenye kushukuru, au mwenye kukufuru.
arabic: إِنَّا هَدَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرٗا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا
footnotes: Hakika Sisi tumembainishia Njia ya Uwongofu, ama awe Muumini au awe kafiri.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: innā hadaynāhu al-sabīla immā shākiran wa-immā kafūran
